actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The giant makes two Spiked Tree Branch or Rotten Snack attacks.

actions.name: Spiked Tree Branch
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 14 (2d8+5) bludgeoning damage plus 5 (2d4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Rotten Snack
actions.desc: _Ranged Weapon Attack:_ +8 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 12 (2d6+5) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 16 CON save or be poisoned until the end of its next turn.

bonus_actions.name: Body Bounce
bonus_actions.desc: The hill giant bumps its stomach, hip, shoulder, knee, or other part of its body into a creature within 10 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 16 STR save or be pushed up to 10 feet away from the giant and knocked prone.

special_abilities.name: Giant Attributes
special_abilities.desc: The hill giant is resistant to the stunned condition, and it is vulnerable to the prone condition.

special_abilities.name: Show of Might
special_abilities.desc: The hill giant can use STR instead of CHA when making CHA (Intimidation) checks.
